name: Water Bucket, Lava Bucket and Milk Bucket
Dig straight down to Bedrock from Sea level (1x1 hole)
Set fire to a Villager's House
Place an Iron, Gold and Diamond block on top of each other
Never use a Sword
tooltip: Never use a Sword for Combat or Block Breaking. Holding or crafting is fine.

name: Wear 4 Different Armour types at the same time
tooltip: Example: GOLD shoes, LEATHER Trousers, IRON Chestplate and DIAMOND Helmet

name: Activate a 6x6 Nether Portal (not counting corners)
tooltip: Width/height of the obsidian frame, disregarding corners (or in other words, width/height of the - once activated - purple portal area).

name: Clean a Pattern off a Banner
2 Creepers in the same Boat
tooltip: The 2 Creepers must be in the same boat at the same time
